description: Try our easy to follow Citrus Avocado Purée Crostini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bruschetta & crostini,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Citrus Avocado Purée Crostini Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Purée 1 large ripe avocado with 100g cream cheese, 1 garlic clove, 1 tbsp olive oil, grated zest of 1 lemon, juice of 1/2 lemon, salt, and Tabasco sauce to taste in a blender or food processor. Spoon on top of the crostini and garnish with finely chopped chives and a strip of lemon or zest or 1/2 roasted cherry tomato. You can replace the grated lemon zest and juice with lime and omit the Tabasco if you prefer.
